views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10 and 11

This tweak will let you use your Touch ID sensor as a gesture controller.

Current gestures are:
- Touch
- Hold
- Double Touch
- Triple Touch
- Touch and Hold

Current actions are:
- Lock
- Home
- Switcher
- Flashlight
- Screenshot
- Reachability
- Switch to last app
- Siri
- Rotation lock
- Control Center
- Notification Center
- Close current app

If your device relocks you are not lifting your finger fast enough. Set an higher wait time or change the Touch action.

If you are not getting vibrations check you enabled them in your stock Settings -> Sounds.

Bioprotect currently breaks this tweak or part of it. You have to choose until this gets fixed.

Configure in settings.
